data.title: International Property & Travel Volume 25 Number 4
data.meta_description: The latest issue of International Property & Travel magazine is a ‘Superyacht & Marina Special’. It combines stunning homes for sale, superb holida...
data.text: The latest issue of International Property & Travel magazine is a ‘Superyacht & Marina Special’. It combines stunning homes for sale, superb holiday resorts, spas and hotels, advice on kitchen interior design, supercars, watches, jewellery, fashion and accessories. Art lovers will also find advance notice of forthcoming exhibitions, auctions and fairs across the world. Features include the finest marina properties in Dubai, Fort Lauderdale, Italy, Spain, Monaco, France, Cyprus and London. Alongside these articles we’ve also suggested fabulous hotels enabling you to explore each area thoroughly before you invest in a property there. We go on to seek expert advice on owning superyachts as well as the most impressive but practical solutions for their interior design. International Property Citizenship Services can also assist readers who would like to find out more about Citizenship by Investment Programs. Our focus this time is on second citizenship in St Kitts & Nevis.
